```kt
    local box = display.newRect( 0, 50, 100, 100)
    box:setFillColor( 1, 1, 1)
    box.alpha = 1

    local function removeBox()
      if box.alpha == 1 then
        print("box removed")
        display.remove( box )
        box = nil
      end
    end
    timer.performWithDelay( 1000, removeBox, 1 ) -- Runs timer to 1000 milliseconds before calling the block within removeBox()
    ```
